name: Bomberman by Kaboum band power plus!
body:
# World of Bomberman
## A remake of the famous bomberman.

Hi!
You are about to discover a remake of the original bomberman game made by a team of 5 peoples from [{Epitech.} Rennes](http://www.epitech.eu/). 
* Benjamin Businaro
* Sullivan Lacheteau
* Quentin Leffray
* Vincent Lemonnier
* Nicolas Magere

This game was our third project in C++. We worked 1 month and 3 days and made more than 800 of commits. That was during our second year as students at Epitech and we had to make it from scratch.

***

### Let's take a quick look at the features
* 3 games modes (solo, cooperation, versus)
* 4 famous characters from [World of Warcraft](http://eu.battle.net/wow/)
* 4 special abilities
* 3rd person camera
* Animated loading screen
* Amazing introduction video
* Achievements to unlock
* Power up to gather
* Chickens to kick
* Local profiles with score saving
* Game saving & loading
* Joystick support (Xbox 360, PS2 & PS3)
* A whole pack of tiny features to discover.

Our [gallery](http://imgur.com/a/4IVfz).
